sentences.sentence: So the project concentrates on merging Mandarin with appropriate pictograms - we call them Mandagrams.
sentences.translation: 所以这个项目就致力于把汉语与对应的象形图融合起来——我们称之为“Mandagram”(汉字表意图)。

sentences.sentence: Natural stone texture luster, rich sense of rhythm, the stone form appearance modelling diversity, or or abstract pictograms.
sentences.translation: 石材纹理自然光泽，富有韵律感，石形外观造型多样，或抽象或象形。

sentences.sentence: Pictograms of male and female figures on the floor and elevators pointed the way to shower rooms. It was all very slick and simple.
sentences.translation: 职员少言寡语，地板上印有男女标识，电梯里有浴室方向的指示标志，一切都很简洁明了。
